SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CONSTITUENT_HAS_CONSTITUENCYCODE_CHECKENDDATE
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Checks for a given constituency code, taking into consideration the current date and enddate to see if they match.
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
CREATE FUNCTION USR_UFN_CONSTITUENT_HAS_CONSTITUENCYCODE_CHECKENDDATE ( @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier, -- con id of the constituent @CONSTITUENCYCODEID uniqueidentifier -- constituency code id to look for ) RETURNS tinyint AS BEGIN declare @compareDate date = CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 101) -- only the date portion, not time declare @toDate date declare @fromDate date declare @resultCode tinyint = 0
select @fromDate = DATEFROM, @toDate = DATETO from dbo.CONSTITUENCY where CONSTITUENTID = @CONSTITUENTID and CONSTITUENCYCODEID = @CONSTITUENCYCODEID and (DATEFROM is null or DATEFROM <= @compareDate) and (DATETO is null or @compareDate <= DATETO)
if (@fromDate is null) And (@toDate is null) set @resultCode = 0 else begin if @toDate is null Or @toDate > @compareDate set @resultCode = 1 else begin if @toDate = @compareDate set @resultCode = 2 end end
-- Return the result of the function RETURN @resultCode;
END
